General.Title: Inbox
General.UnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?

Login.Description: Welcome to Inbox, to use our app you must login with your Google Account
Login.GoogleError: Failed to login with Google, maybe your email or password was incorrect
Login.Relogin: Your login session has been revoked. Please login again

Logout.Confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

NoReminders.Heading: Huzzah, you've completed all your reminders!
NoReminders.SubHeading: Why don't you go out and ride a bike

General.Title: Damn! We've had a crash
General.Message: Don't worry, we've notified our rescue team that something went wrong

404.Title: Where are you!
404.Message: We're not sure how you got here, but this page does not exist

DevError.Title: Damn! We've messed up.
DevError.Message: Looks like we broke something. Don't worry, we've notified our rescue team that something went wrong

Fatal.Title: Damn! The whole app has crashed.
Fatal.Message: We've tried to notify our rescue team that something went wrong, but that may have also failed. Please get in touch to let us know this happened:

NoJS.Title: You do not have JavaScript enabled
NoJS.Message: This website requires JavaScript to be enabled to run. Are you living in the dark ages?

AppLoadingTimeout.Title: The app is taking a while to load
AppLoadingTimeout.Message: We're taking a bit longer to load than usually, hang on and we'll get there.

LoginNoUser.Title: Could not log you in
LoginNoUser.Message: Don't worry, we've notified our rescue team that something went wrong. Why not try again.
